mapper.select: Select COUNT(*) From board Where brd_md= #{brd_md} and brd_lg= 700

Select * FROM (Select rownum rn, b.brd_num, u.nick, b.title, b.reg_date, b.user_num, b.view_cnt From board b, user1 u Where brd_md= #{brd_md} and brd_lg=700 and b.user_num = u.user_num Order By b.reg_date DESC) Where rn Between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: Insert Into board (brd_num, user_num, brd_lg, brd_md, title, conts, view_cnt, reg_date, brd_group, brd_step, img) values (BRD_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{user_num}, 700, #{brd_md}, #{title}, #{conts}, 0, sysdate, BRD_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, #{img})
mapper.select: Select b.*, u.nick From board b, user1 u Where b.brd_num = #{brd_num} and b.user_num = u.user_num

Select rownum, a.*, u.nick, replyCount(a.brd_num) replyCount From (Select * From board Where brd_num = brd_group and brd_lg = 700 and brd_md = 103 and view_cnt is not null ORDER by view_cnt desc) a, user1 u Where u.user_num = a.user_num and rownum BETWEEN 1 and 5

Select rownum rn, a.* From (select brd.*, count_like(brd.brd_num) as like_cnt, likeyn(brd.brd_num, #{user_num}) AS likeyn From board brd Where brd.brd_md = 102 and brd.brd_lg = 700 ORDER BY like_cnt desc) a Where rownum BETWEEN 1 and 5

Select a.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn, b.*, user1.nick, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN user1 ON b.user_num = user1.user_num WHERE b.brd_md = 103 and b.brd_lg = 700 AND b.brd_Group = b.brd_num AND (b.title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' Or user1.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC) a left join (Select Count(*), brd_num From board_like Group By brd_num) c on a.brd_num = c.brd_num Where a.rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

Select bbb.rn, bbb.*, replyCount(bbb.brd_num) replyCount, count_like(bbb.brd_num) as like_cnt, likeyn(bbb.brd_num, #{user_num}) AS likeyn From (Select rownum rn, bb.* From (SELECT b.*, user1.nick FROM board b JOIN user1 ON b.user_num = user1.user_num WHERE b.brd_md = 102 and b.brd_lg = 700 AND b.brd_Group = b.brd_num AND (b.title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' Or user1.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' Or b.addr like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC) bb) bbb Where bbb.rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT Count(*) FROM board b JOIN user1 ON b.user_num = user1.user_num WHERE b.brd_md = #{brd_md} and b.brd_lg = 700 AND b.brd_Group = b.brd_num
AND (b.title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' Or user1.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
Or b.addr like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

Select a.*, b.title, b.brd_md, b.user_num, b.chg_id From (Select count(*) new_Cmt, brd_num From board_re_chk where send_date= 1 and user_num = #{user_num} GROUP BY brd_num)a, board b Where a.brd_num = b.brd_num

SELECT rownum, b.*, u.nick, c.title chg_title, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN user1 u On b.user_num = u.user_num JOIN challenge c ON b.chg_id = c.chg_id WHERE b.user_num = #{user_num} AND b.brd_md = 100 and b.brd_lg = 700 and b.brd_step = 0 ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC between rn 1 and 5

SELECT b.*, u.nick, c.title chg_title, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN user1 u On b.user_num = u.user_num JOIN challenge c ON b.chg_id = c.chg_id WHERE b.user_num = #{user_num} AND b.brd_md = 101 and b.brd_lg = 700 and b.brd_step = 0 ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC

SELECT b.*, u.nick, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN user1 u On b.user_num = u.user_num WHERE b.user_num = #{user_num} AND b.brd_md = 102 and b.brd_step = 0 and b.brd_lg = 700 ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC

Select c.* From (Select rownum rn, a.* from (SELECT b.*, u.nick, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN user1 u On b.user_num = u.user_num WHERE b.user_num = #{user_num} AND b.brd_md = #{brd_md} and b.brd_step = 0 and b.brd_lg = 700 ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC) a) c Where rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
Select count(*) total, brd_md From board Where user_num = #{user_num} and brd_lg = 700 and brd_num = brd_Group Group BY brd_md

Select d.* From (Select rownum rn, a.* From (Select b.*, u.nick, c.title chg_title, replyCount(b.brd_num) replyCount FROM board b JOIN User1 u ON b.user_num = u.user_num JOIN challenge c ON b.chg_id = c.chg_id Where b.brd_md = #{brd_md} and b.user_num = #{user_num} and b.brd_group = b.brd_num and b.brd_lg = 700 ORDER by b.reg_date DESC) a ) d Where rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
